product_short_description: Ultra-thin and lightweight laptop with Apple M1 chip for fast performance.
product_long_description: Experience the power of the Apple M1 chip in the MacBook Air. With a sleek design, Retina display, and long battery life, it's the ideal laptop for everyday tasks and creative work.
product_highlights: 13.3-inch Retina display with True Tone for vibrant visuals
Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 7-core or 8-core GPU options
Up to 16GB unified memory for seamless multitasking
Up to 2TB SSD storage for fast data access
Magic Keyboard with scissor mechanism for comfortable typing
Fanless design for silent operation

product_short_description: Pro-level smartphone with advanced camera system and A15 Bionic chip.
product_long_description: Capture stunning photos and enjoy powerful performance with the iPhone 13 Pro. Featuring a ProMotion display, Pro camera system, and 5G capability, it's the perfect choice for photography and productivity.
product_highlights: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology
Triple 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras with Night mode
A15 Bionic chip with Neural Engine for fast and efficient performance
Ceramic Shield front cover for enhanced durability
5G capable for high-speed internet connectivity
iOS 15 with App Library, Focus, and enhanced privacy features

product_short_description: Powerful and versatile tablet with M1 chip and stunning Liquid Retina XDR display.
product_long_description: Unlock new possibilities with the iPad Pro. Featuring the M1 chip, 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, and 5G capability, it's a powerhouse for creativity, productivity, and entertainment.
product_highlights: 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology
Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU for desktop-class performance
Up to 2TB of high-speed SSD storage
12MP Ultra Wide front camera with Center Stage
Thunderbolt and USB 4 support for versatile connectivity
Magic Keyboard and Apple Pencil support for enhanced productivity

product_short_description: Advanced smartwatch with larger, always-on Retina display and health features.
product_long_description: Stay connected, informed, and motivated with the Apple Watch Series 7. With a larger display, faster charging, and new workout features, it's the perfect companion for a healthy and active lifestyle.
product_highlights: Always-on Retina display with 20% more screen area than Series 6
Advanced health features, including ECG and blood oxygen monitoring
Up to 45% faster charging with 33% faster charging cable
Dust resistance and WR50 water resistance for durability
New cycling workout and fall detection features
WatchOS 8 with enhanced mindfulness app and redesigned Home app

product_short_description: Compact desktop computer with Apple M1 chip for fast and efficient performance.
product_long_description: Experience the power of the Apple M1 chip in the Mac mini. With its compact design, versatile connectivity options, and blazing-fast performance, it's a powerhouse for a wide range of tasks.
product_highlights: Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU for exceptional performance
8GB or 16GB unified memory options for smooth multitasking
Up to 2TB SSD storage for fast data access
Two Thunderbolt/USB 4 ports, HDMI 2.0, and Gigabit Ethernet
Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 for high-speed wireless connectivity
macOS Monterey with redesigned Safari, Focus, and Quick Note

product_short_description: High-fidelity, noise-canceling earbuds with immersive sound and customizable fit.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in premium audio quality with the AirPods Pro. Featuring active noise cancellation, Transparency mode, and a customizable fit, they deliver an unparalleled listening experience.
product_highlights: Adaptive EQ for immersive sound quality
Active noise cancellation with Transparency mode
Customizable silicone ear tips for a comfortable and secure fit
Sweat and water resistance for workouts and outdoor activities
H1 chip for seamless Apple device integration
Qi-compatible wireless charging case for convenience

product_short_description: All-in-one desktop computer with vibrant 4.5K Retina display and Apple M1 chip.
product_long_description: Elevate your desktop experience with the iMac. Featuring a 4.5K Retina display, Apple M1 chip, and a range of vibrant colors, it's a powerful and stylish addition to any workspace.
product_highlights: 24-inch 4.5K Retina display with P3 wide color gamut
Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU for remarkable performance
Up to 16GB unified memory and up to 2TB SSD storage
Immersive audio with six-speaker sound system and spatial audio support
Two Thunderbolt/USB 4 ports and additional USB-C ports
macOS Monterey with redesigned apps and improved system features

product_short_description: High-performance media player with 4K HDR support and Apple-designed chip.
product_long_description: Transform your entertainment experience with Apple TV 4K. Enjoy stunning visuals, immersive audio, and access to a vast library of content with the power of Apple's custom-designed chip.
product_highlights: 4K High Dynamic Range (Dolby Vision and HDR10) for lifelike visuals
Apple-designed A12 Bionic chip for smooth and responsive performance
Siri Remote for intuitive navigation and voice control
Apple Fitness+ and Apple Arcade support for additional entertainment
Dolby Atmos for immersive, theater-like audio experience
Access to a wide range of streaming services and apps

product_short_description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and sweat-resistant design.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in music with the Beats Studio Buds. These true wireless earbuds feature active noise cancellation, a comfortable fit, and sweat resistance, making them perfect for workouts and daily use.
product_highlights: Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound experience
Custom acoustic platform for clear, balanced sound
Sweat and water-resistant design for workouts and active lifestyles
Up to 8 hours of listening time (up to 24 hours with charging case)
Intuitive touch controls for music playback and calls
Compatible with Apple and Android devices for versatile use
